DOC.brief_summary: The present study assess reliability validity Finnish version Prothesis Evaluation Questionnaire . Major low extremity amputee use prosthesis requite present study Helsinki Uusimaa Hospital District Central Finland Health Care District .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Validity Finnish Version Prothesis Evaluation Questionnaire
DOC.detailed_description: > 100 low extremity prosthetic user major low extremity amputation recruit present study . The aim ass reliability validity Finnish version Prothesis Evaluation Questionnaire ( PEQ ) . The participant fill pre information form , PEQ , 15D health-related quality life questionnaire , Houghton prothesis questionnaire , Locomotor Capabilities Index - 5 , Prothesis Evaluation Questionnaire Mobility Section - 5 . The psychometric ability PEQ instrument analyze .
DOC.criteria: Major low extremity amputation Prothetization Other amputation besides major low extremity No prothesis use
